===== Transaction =====

      Supervisor
      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        1. Supervisor can unsettle Transaction
        2. Supervisor can comment Transaction

      Accountant
      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        1. Accountant can unsettle Transaction
        2. Accountant cant update Transaction

      Clerk
      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        1. Clerk can unsettle Transaction

      Admin
      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        1. Admin can do anything except if explicitly stated otherwise

      Others
      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        1. Others can update Transaction
        2. Others can unsettle Transaction, with condition
        3. Others can print Transaction



===== User =====

      Others
      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        1. Others can see_timeline User, with condition
        2. Others can sign_in User, with condition





Printed at 01-01-2020 12:34AM +00:00
